definitions: a person or company that underwrites an insurance risk

examples.text: insurance underwriters and risk managers are concerned about fire in sleeping areas

shortDefinitions: person or company that underwrites insurance risk

definitions: a bank or other financial institution that pledges to buy all the unsold shares in an issue of new shares

examples.text: the issues are guaranteed success as the underwriters will buy whatever is not snapped up by the market

shortDefinitions: bank or other financial institution that pledges to buy all unsold shares in issue of new shares

definitions: a person or company that undertakes to finance or otherwise support or guarantee something

examples.text: a major underwriter of the project

shortDefinitions: person or company that undertakes to finance or otherwise support or guarantee something
